page.title: 05BERWICK COASTGUARD STATION
page.content: Berwick coastguard station is a sector station North of the Tweed.It has one full time coastguard called Mr.Wood.He has nine auxilliaries working part time.The station has no radar equipment and is not very busy.It has mainly light rescue equipment and Mr.Wood co-ordinates other services for some rescues.He carries a little bleeper with him all the time and it will let him know if anyone needs help.Mr.Wood is also in charge of Holy Island station and has eleven auxilliaries there.He has his Land-Rover to travel about in and to help in rescues,it is called the Mobile Rescue Unit.
